## useUserSelect() function

Sets `user-select` CSS property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function useUserSelect<E extends HTMLElement>(value: UserSelectType | boolean, options?: UseUserSelectOptions<E>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | [UserSelectType](./react-hooks.userselecttype.md) \| boolean | value for <code>user-select</code> CSS property (<code>boolean</code> shorthand also available) |
|  options | [UseUserSelectOptions](./react-hooks.useuserselectoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;E&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> configuration options for hook |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
